name: FetchHubspotListById
description: Fetch a single HubSpot CRM list using its ILS list ID.

parameters.name: list_id
parameters.description: The ILS ID of the HubSpot CRM list to fetch.

value_schema.description: The **ILS ID** of the list to fetch.

parameters.name: include_filter_definitions
parameters.description: Include filter branch definitions in the response. Defaults to false, meaning filter definitions are not included.

value_schema.description: A flag indicating whether or not the response object list definition should include a filter branch definition. By default, object list definitions will not have their filter branch definitions included in the response.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_crm API.

parameters.name: includeFilters
parameters.description: A flag indicating whether or not the response object list definition should include a filter branch definition. By default, object list definitions will not have their filter branch definitions included in the response.

value_schema.description: A flag indicating whether or not the response object list definition should include a filter branch definition. By default, object list definitions will not have their filter branch definitions included in the response.

parameters.name: listId
parameters.description: The **ILS ID** of the list to fetch.

value_schema.description: The **ILS ID** of the list to fetch.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
